txt.en: Gildor has invited you to play a game of Hiders and Seekers.\n\nYou should go to the gazebo in Tighfield to begin the game.
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the hider!</rgb>
You should find the hobbit children hiding throughout Tighfield.\n\nGildor has assured you that you do not need to venture past Tighfield's walls.
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the hider!</rgb>
DNT
DNT
'I thought nobody would ever see me here...'
'The next hiding spot I pick won't be easy!'
'How did you find me?!'
Find and <rgb=#00ff00>poke</rgb> hiders (5/6)
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the hider!</rgb>
'But... but this is the best hiding spot! Periwinkle told me!'
'Aw... I wanted to keep playing!'
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the hider!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far from the hider!</rgb>
It's just a game of Hiders and Seekers. What can go wrong?
Gildor might know where the last hider is

'Hail, friend! Would you like to join in our game of Hiders and Seekers? You may decline, but I will warn you that the children are quite tenacious! I had no choice but to surrender when they found me.

'Alas, they're still as energetic as they were when we started playing, and I've grown weary. Could you assume the role of seeker for a while? When you're ready, climb up to the gazebo and begin counting down. Rest assured, there is no need to venture beyond Tighfield's walls to find the children.

'Good luck!'
Count down from ten
Hiders And Seekers Over Yonder
Talk to Gildor
Go to the gazebo
'One of the children has disappeared? Yes, I believe I know of whom you speak; her name is Periwinkle.'
Find and <rgb=#00ff00>poke</rgb> hiders ([placeholder]/6)
DNT
Ready or not, here you come!
DNT
DNT
DNT
You've found all but one of the hiders. Where could the last child be?
Found hiders ([placeholder]/6)
Gildor is resting in Tighfield by the gazebo.\n\nHe might know where the last hider is.
Time to close your eyes and count!
